vote.title: Authorize the (1) acceptance of a grant in the amount of $50,000.00 from the American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty Animals (ASPCA) to be used for the purchase of pet food for the period November 25, 2020 through March 31, 2021; (2) establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $50,000.00 in the ASPCA COVID-19 Emergency Relief Fund; (3) receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $50,000.00 in the ASPCA COVID-19 Emergency Relief Fund; and (4) execution of the grant agreement and all terms, conditions, and documents required by the grant agreement - Not to exceed $50,000.00 - Financing: ASPCA Grant Funds
vote.description: Authorize the (1) acceptance of a grant in the amount of $50,000.00 from the American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty Animals (ASPCA) to be used for the purchase of pet food for the period November 25, 2020 through March 31, 2021; (2) establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $50,000.00 in the ASPCA COVID-19 Emergency Relief Fund; (3) receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $50,000.00 in the ASPCA COVID-19 Emergency Relief Fund; and (4) execution of the grant agreement and all terms, conditions, and documents required by the grant agreement - Not to exceed $50,000.00 - Financing: ASPCA Grant Funds
